price: Kwa neema ya Mola wako Mlezi wewe si mwendawazimu.
footnotes: Hakika wewe, na Mwenyezi Mungu amekuneemesha kwa kukupa Unabii, si mchachefu wa akili, wala mpumbavu wa mawazo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
